videos.description: Boston College's Rich Kelly takes his defender off the dribble and is somehow able to flip up a difficult shot high over a Villanova defender and in.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Kelly flips in difficult layup for Eagles bucket) 2020/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kelly flips in difficult layup for Eagles bucket

videos.description: After having his first shot blocked, Villanova's Jermaine Samuels gets the loose ball and goes back up again for a hard-fought basket in the paint.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Villanova's Samuels battles for 2nd-chance bucket) 2020/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Villanova's Samuels battles for 2nd-chance bucket

videos.description: Frederick Scott gets the ball in the corner and quickly beats his defender off the dribble as he speeds to the basket to stuff down a two-handed dunk for Boston College.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (BC's Scott stuffs down a dunk off inbounds pass) 2020/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: BC's Scott stuffs down a dunk off inbounds pass

videos.description: Wynston Tabbs attacks the baseline, using a right-to-left crossover to shed his defender, then goes up to flip in a nice reverse layup on the opposite side for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Tabbs crosses defender for smooth and-1 lay-in) 2020/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tabbs crosses defender for smooth and-1 lay-in
